ProjectTitle: Creation of a humanized mouse model for demyelinating peripheral neuropathies as a platform for therapeutic testing.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
14/02/2025
Currently, you are only describing RDM for your own team. However, a DMP typically encompasses RDM for all project partners so you can use the DMP to understand which partners generate which datasets and where it is eventually stored, archived and shared
Data: please include the approval number for the animal studies. 
Preservation: please note that the minimum preservation time of 5 years is the FWO guideline, the KU Leuven RDM policy requires a 10-year preservation period for all relevant data. For more details see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
label: good with suggestions
